Test Name: Cyclic Adenosine Monophosphate (cAMP) Analysis, Serum and Urine
Purpose: To quantify cyclic adenosine monophosphate (cAMP) levels in serum and urine for diagnostic evaluation.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) for serum; clean urine container for urine
Equipment: HPLC system or ELISA kit (with associated microplate reader)
